thread.title: Imagine Dragons' Dan Reynolds Welcomes Twin Daughters with Wife Aja Volkman!
thread.title_full: Imagine Dragons' Dan Reynolds Welcomes Twin Daughters with Wife Aja Volkman!

author: Just Jared
title: Imagine Dragons' Dan Reynolds Welcomes Twin Daughters with Wife Aja Volkman!
text:
Dan Reynolds and wife Aja Volkman have added two more daughters to their family!
The 29-year-old Imagine Dragons singer and his musician wife welcomed twin daughters – Gia James and Coco Rae – on Tuesday (March 28), People reports.
PHOTOS: Check out the latest pics of Dan Reynolds 
Dan and Aja are already parents to four-year-old daughter Arrow Eve .
Dan recently took to Instagram to share an adorable new pic of his Gia and Coco .
See the sweet photo below!
welcome to this beautiful world Gia James and Coco Rae 
A post shared by Daniel Coulter Reynolds (@danreynolds) on Mar 30, 2017 at 4:46pm PDT 

Congrats to the growing family!
